roleset.name: deduce, come to believe
roleset.note: INFER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'infer' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Coming to believe. (from infer.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Agreement, disapproval, boredom and distraction all]-1 can be inferred [*-1]from the subjects' twist of a dial.
example.arg: from the subjects' twist of a dial

example.name: ARG2 and ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Based on his comments , analysts infer that Taiwan may in the near future establish formal diplomatic relations with another European country .
example.arg: that Taiwan may in the near future establish formal diplomatic relations with another European country
